scripts.pm2start: pm2 start node-add/server.js --node-args="--perf_basic_prof" --name "add" && pm2 start node-calc/server.js --node-args="--perf_basic_prof" --name "entrypoint" && pm2 start node-divide/server.js --node-args="--perf_basic_prof" --name "divide" && pm2 start node-multiply/server.js --node-args="--perf_basic_prof" --name "multiply" && pm2 start  node-postfix/server.js --node-args="--perf_basic_prof" --name "postfix" && pm2 start node-subtract/server.js --node-args="--perf_basic_prof" --name "subtract" && pm2 start node-power/server.js --node-args="--perf_basic_prof" --name "power"
scripts.start: for dir in ./node-*; do (cd "$dir" && node --perf_basic_prof server.js  > /dev/null &); done
scripts.install: cd node-add && npm install && cd ../node-calc && npm install && cd ../node-divide && npm install && cd ../node-multiply && npm install && cd ../node-postfix && npm install && cd ../node-subtract && npm install && cd ../node-power && npm install
